title: game glitch
body:
so lately i have been getting this glitch that when i get into a ranked game it makes the loading screen go pitch black and never loads in, i also cant alt tab out of it or anything like. I have tried to get into like 5 ranked games and it does the same thing please help
thanks for reading.
P.S im on a mac

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through all the fixes in the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) page for me, let me know if anything helps.
